title: Strengthening AI Practical Competencies: Designing and Implementing Interactive Peer Assessment for Pre-Service Teachers

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can explain the three-stage process of interactive peer assessment: initial evaluation, feedback exchange, and improvement proposal.
Learners can use LMS-based tools to provide specific and actionable feedback on peers' learning design projects.
Learners can improve their own projects in two or more ways by analyzing peer feedback.
Learners can recognize three or more conflict situations that may occur during interactive assessment processes and propose resolution strategies.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
